original_text: Our Pledge As members, contributors, and leaders of the Frontier Tech Leaders(FTL) Global Community, we pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, visible or invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics,gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.
entities:
Entities:
1. Frontier Tech Leaders (FTL) Global Community
summary: The Frontier Tech Leaders (FTL) Global Community pledges to maintain a harassment-free environment for everyone involved, irrespective of age, physical attributes, disabilities (visible or not), ethnicity, gender identity, experience level, education, socio-economic status, nationality, appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.
